nodes.text: Icefang was a massive Pantran whitefang living on Hoth during the Cold War. It was killed around 3642 BBY.

Icefang appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Hoth. It is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed by characters of both factions or loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
